title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route
author: oeyoews
name: neotw-tag-route
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/readme","description":"neotw-tag-route","text":"[[在线文档|https://neotw.vercel.app/docs/plugins/neotw-tag-route]]

> path: `/%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Foeyoews%2Fneotw-tag-route%2Ftags.json`"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/tags-template.json":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/tags-template.json","text":"{{{ [tags[]!is[system]!prefix[$:/]join[,]] }}}"},"$:/core/modules/server/routes/get-tags-json.js":{"title":"$:/core/modules/server/routes/get-tags-json.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/core/modules/server/routes/get-tags-json.js
type: application/javascript

// module-type: route

\*/
!function(){"use strict";exports.method="GET",exports.path=/^\/recipes\/default\/tags.json$/,exports.handler=function(t,e,s){var r=s.queryParameters.filter||"[tags[]]";const n=s.wiki.filterTiddlers(r);var i=JSON.stringify(n);s.sendResponse(200,{"Content-Type":"application/json"},i,"utf8")}}();","type":"application/javascript"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/tags.json":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/tags.json","_render_template":"$:/core/templates/server/tags.json","_render_type":"json","text":"<<jsontiddler title:"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-tag-route/tags-template.json">>"},"$:/core/templates/server/tags.json":{"title":"$:/core/templates/server/tags.json","text":"\whitespace trim
\define tv-config-static() yes
\define tv-wikilink-template() $uri_encoded$
\import [subfilter{$:/core/config/GlobalImportFilter}]
<$transclude mode="block"/>"}}}
